General.Name: Seker Finansal Kiralama AS
General.Description: Seker Finansal Kiralama A.S. provides financial leasing services. It offers leasing services for the purchase of production machinery, construction equipment and forklifts, logistics transport equipment, commercial/passenger vehicles, farm equipment, medical devices, yachts and boats, and energy generation and technology packages, as well as workplaces, offices, factory buildings, and lands. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

4.Name: Mr. Baris  Demirci
4.Title: Sr. Internal Controller & Desk Compliance Officer
